column6: Steve Rogers, the original Captain America - trapped in time! Bucky and Sharon Carter - in the hands of the enemy! As Dr. Doom and the Red Skull make a terrifying pact that could destroy what Captain America means forever!  Ed Brubaker and Bryan Hitch bring you the penultimate issue of Marvel's event of the year! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | letterer:Joe Caramagna | inker:Butch Guice | penciller:Bryan Hitch | colorist:Paul Mounts
